text: Wágner is a name. As a given name, it is Portuguese in origin. The surname is a Czechized form of German surname Wagner. Notable people with the name include: ==Given name== * Wágner de Andrade Borges (born 1987), Brazilian footballer * Wágner Canotilho (born 1945), Brazilian footballer * Wágner Ferreira dos Santos (born 1985), Brazilian footballer * Wágner Luiz Fogolari (born 1989), Brazilian footballer * Wágner Pires de Almeida (born 1973), Brazilian footballer ==Surname== * Martin Wágner (born 1980), Czech photographer * Tomáš Wágner (born 1990), Czech footballer ==See also== * * Vagner * Wagner (disambiguation) Category:Portuguese masculine given names Category:Czech-language surnames
title: Wágner
